post.description:
Creates an account in Playmaker.

Authentication: required

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.

domain.description:
This company's primary domain, not including www or https://. 

(Example: apple.com, sony.com)

play_id.description:
Unique identifier for the play that this account will be added to.

This value can be found through the "Get Plays" endpoint, or in the app by visiting the Play and grabbing its ID from the url.

linkedin.description: The Linkedin URL of this company.

get.summary: Returns a list of emails from your Playmaker account.
get.description:
Returns a list of emails from your Playmaker account.

Authentication: required

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page of the dataset to retrieve.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of items to include per page in the dataset. The maximum allowable value is 200.

play_id.description: Filter emails associated with a specific play in Playmaker.

mailbox_id.description: Filter emails associated with a specific mailbox in Playmaker.

from_email.description: Filter emails sent from a specific email address.

date_after.description: Filter emails sent or received after a specific timestamp.

date_before.description: Filter emails sent or received before a specific timestamp.

engagement.description: Filter emails based on specific engagement types such as opened, clicked, or replied.

400.description: Input Error. Check the request payload for issues.

403.description: Access denied. Additional privileges are needed access the requested resource.

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource does not exist.
